attributes.background: Due to a recent incident where a 16 year old boy was killed whilst cycling on Wilshouse Lane In the dark as there is no light , light posts could prevent anything as such in the future and save lives.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be about a decision that's the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
